messages.message: Invalid colorModel in basic DFD block for RGB VkFormat.
messages.details: DFD block #1 colorModel in basic DFD block is KHR_DF_MODEL_CIEXYY but for VkFormat VK_FORMAT_R8G8B8A8_UNORM it must be KHR_DF_MODEL_RGBSDA.

messages.message: Invalid sample channelType for colorModel in the basic DFD block.
messages.details: DFD block #1 sample #4 channelType in basic DFD block is (0xF) which is not valid for colorModel KHR_DF_MODEL_CIEXYY.
